casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harry Sharod JAMES 514PA11-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, for James, Harry Sharod. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Eric J. Zogry, Juvenile Defender, Marsha L. Levick, Attorney at Law, for Juvenile Law Center. Mark Dorosin, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth M. Haddix, Attorney at Law, Pittsboro, Jennifer W. Marsh, Director of Research, Brent Ducharme, Attorney at Law, Allen Buansi, Attorney at Law, K. Ricky Watson, Jr., Co-Director of Youth Justice Project, Peggy Nicholson, Attorney at Law, for Senator Angela Bryant, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of November 2017 by State of NC to Amend Its Brief as Appellant by Striking a Portion of the Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
